TextView.android:text: Have You Done the Shopping for the Trip?
Have You Taken Necessary Medications for the Trip?
Have You Planned About "What To Do" for Trip?
Plan the Expense for the Trip?
Have You Packed the Bags for the Trip?
Take a Deep Sleep to getup Early Morning Fresh.
Take Photos of Documents and Luggage.
Do Not Forget to Get Your Journey Tickets. Again, Check the Journey Luggage and Other Stuff.
Book a Cab or Check Other Travel Timings to Reach Source.
Happy Journey. You Can Manage your Expense and Checklists from the Below Sections.
